mahārakkhita： mahārakkhita（pu）
မဟာရက္ခိတ（ပု）
[mahanta+rakkhita]
[မဟန္တ+ရက္ခိတ]

Mahārakkhita：1．Mahārakkhita Thera．He went after the Third Council to theYona country，and there preached theKālakārama Sutta．One hundred and seventy thousand people adopted the Buddha’s faith and ten thousand entered the Order．Mhv．xii．5，39； Dpv．viii．9； Sp．i．64，67．

2．Mahārakkhita．An ascetic in Himavā．See theSomanassa Jātaka．He is identified withSāriputta．J．iv．454．

3．Mahārakkhita Thera． Incumbent of Uparimandalaka （J．vi．30）．SeeMahā-Sangharakkhita （3）．

4．Mahārakkhita Thera． When told by his patron that the latter had given a robe to a certain monk，he praised him； when the man offered to give him one，he praised that likewise．MA．ii．666．
